basics.name: Onur Uzun
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I like to experiment with current software technologies, coloring them, playing with their pixels. And also, I like fantastic/anime series and I can’t say no to a great coffee.In addition to that, I love passing out my experience on new technologies/libraries to the ones who might be interested in this area.Thus, I’m trying to reach out to a bigger audience by turning my experience into blog posts.
